# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

"""
This module contains model classes such as 'Player' 'Teams' ...
"""

from faker import Faker
fake = Faker()
fake.seed(100)



[docs]class Player:
    """
    Player class
    """
    player_count = 101

    def __init__(self,mu=25.0,sigma=25.0/3,name='Doe',reel_skill=None):
        self.mu = mu;
        self.sigma = sigma;
        self.name = fake.name() if name == 'Doe' else name
        self.reel_skill = reel_skill;
        self.id = Player.player_count
        Player.player_count += 1

    def __str__(self):
        return self.name + ', ' +str(self.id)+', '+str(self.reel_skill) + ', m:' + str(self.mu) + ', s:' + str(self.sigma)


[docs]    def isSynthetic(self):
        """
        :return: True if player is synthetic False otherwise
        """
        return self.reel_skill != None



[docs]class Team:
    """
    Team class
    """

    def __init__(self, players=[]):
        self.players = players


[docs]    def addPlayer(self,player):
        self.players.append(player)



[docs]    def size(self):
        return len(self.players)



[docs]    def mu(self):
        mu = 0
        for p in self.players:
            mu += p.mu
        return mu



[docs]    def sigma(self):
        return None;



[docs]    def reel_skill(self):
        rs = 0
        for p in self.players:
            rs += p.reel_skill
        return rs



[docs]    def isSynthetic(self):
        for p in self.players:
            if not(p.isSynthetic): return False
        return True


    def __str__(self):
        s = '('
        for p in self.players:
            s += p.name + ', '
        return s+ ')'



[docs]class Match:
    """
    Match class
    """

    def __init__(self,teams,standings=None):
        self.teams = teams
        if standings == None and not(self.isSynthetic()):
            raise ValueError('Real data & No result')
        elif standings != None and self.isSynthetic():
            raise ValueError('Synthetic data & Given result')
        elif standings == None:
            self.simulate()



[docs]    def isSynthetic(self):
        for t in self.teams:
            if not(t.isSynthetic): return False
        return True

        # TODO implement this function to get synthetic results
